product_name: La Sportiva Thunder III Mid GTX Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: Well suited for backpacking and hiking on moderate to rugged trails, the men's waterproof La Sportiva Thunder III GTX Hiking Boots feature Vibram(R) soles and half steel shanks for performance. Nubuck leather/Cordura(R) nylon uppers feature GORE-TEX(R) waterproof, breathable membranes that are guaranteed to keep your feet dry on wet days. Molded rubber heel stabilizers give excellent ankle support on rough terrain. Vibram(R) River outsoles with Impact Brake System(TM) provide excellent traction when you're hiking up and down hills.
short_description: Well suited for backpacking and hiking on moderate to rugged trails, the men's waterproof La Sportiva Thunder III GTX Hiking Boots feature Vibram(R) soles and half steel shanks for performance.
